author: Staff Reporter
text:
The 21st Pongal Music Festival of Bharatiya Vidya Bhavan will be conducted on its premises between January 13 and 17. This year’s festival is dedicated to the late M.S. Subbulakshmi.

On the inaugural day, the prestigious Sangeeth Samrat award will be conferred on Pappu Venugopala Rao, secretary, The Music Academy, Madras.Every year, a senior musician in Coimbatore is honoured during the festival with the Kovai Subri Muruga Gana Award. This year Mohana Krishnan, founder, Sri Kamakshi Music Group, has been chosen for the award.

A vocal recital by K. Bharat Sundar will be held at 6 p.m. on January 14.

A talk on ‘M.S. Ammaavin Isaiyum Arulum’ is scheduled for January 16 by S. Ganesa Sarma.

The last day of the festival will see Sadguru Sri Thyagaraja Aradhana
title: Pongal music festival from January 13
